column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Israelmba fii Egypt bae no n’ekyir afe a otsia ahaanan edwuowɔtwe no mu no
column3: nna Solomon dzii Israel do hen no n’afe a otsia anan nye no
column4: wɔ bosoom Ziv a ɔyɛ bosoom a otsia ebien no mu no
column5: nna ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ orisi EWURADZE ne dan no."

column2: "Na ɔdan a ɔhen Solomon sii maa EWURADZE no
column3: ne tsentsen yɛ basafa eduasa

column2: "Na abrandaa a ɔwɔ asɔrfi dan no enyim no
column3: ne tsentsen yɛ basafa du
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔdan no ne tɛtɛr no tse no; na ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa enum wɔ ɔdan no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ɔdan no ho ntokura a atenadwuma tsintsim mu."
"Na ɔtotoow ɔdan no ne fasu ho asansansamdo hyiae
column3: twitwaa ɔdan no n’afasu ho hyiae
column4: asɔrfi no na mpiakyir nyina ho: na ɔyɛɛ mpiakyir mpiakyir hyiae:"

column2: "ase ɔsansansamdo no ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa ebien nye fa
column3: na finimfin dze no ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa ebiasa
column4: na dza otsia ebiasa no ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa ebiasa nye fa: na ɔyɛɛ ɔdan no ne fasu ekyir mbamba hyiae
column5: ma mpuna no annhyɛ ɔdan no n’afasu no mu."

column2: "Na ɔdan no
column3: aber a worisi no
column4: wɔdze ɔbo a woesiesie no wɔ abopuei na wɔdze sii: mber a worisi no
column7: anaa edwindadze biara nka wɔ ɔdan no ho."

column2: "Finimfin mpiakyir no n’abow wɔ ɔdan no n’enyimfa afamu: na wɔfow atwer mpomponee dze kɔ finimfin mpia no mu
column3: na wofi finimfin dze no mu kɔ dza otsia ebiasa no mu."

column2: "Nna osii dan no
column3: na owiei; na ɔdze nkyindur mpuna na ntaabow kataa ɔdan no do."

column2: "Na osisii asansansamdo no wɔ ɔdan no no ho nyinara
column3: kor no krɔn basafa ebien nye fa: na wɔdze nkyindur mpuna ma osusuoo dan no mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Solomon nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column8: na idzi me mbransɛm nyinara do dɛ ebɛnantsew mu a; ɔnodze mebɛma m’asɛm a mekaa mekyerɛɛ w’egya David no etsim ama wo."

column2: "Na mebɛtsena Israelmba mu
column3: na monnkɔpow me man Israel."

column2: "Nna Solomon sii dan no
column3: na owiei."

column2: "Na ɔdze nkyindur ntaabow saam ɔdan no mu afasu no ho; ɔdze ndua kataa no mu afasu
column3: fi dan no ne daadze kodur n’enyi nsamdo mpuna no do: na ɔdze kupresi ntaabow saam dan no ne daadze."

column2: "Na ɔdze nkyindur ntaabow sii ɔdan no n’ekyir afamu basafa du fi famu kɛpeem nsamdo mpuna no: mekyerɛ osii dze no mu yɛɛ mpiakyir
column3: mekyerɛ bea krɔnkrɔn no a."

column2: "Na ɔdan no
column3: mekyerɛ asɔrfi no a ɔwɔ mpiakyir no enyim no

column2: "Na ɔdan no mu wɔ nkyindur a woedzi no nkukuduuduw na nhyiren a wɔahanhan edwin: ne nyinara nkyindur a; wonnhu ɔbo biara."
"Na osiesiee mpiakyir wɔ ɔdan no mu finimfin
column3: dɛ wɔdze EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka no besi hɔ."

column2: "Na mpiakyir no mu wɔ ɔkwan a ne tsentsen yɛ basafa du
column3: na ne tɛtɛr basafa du
column4: na no krɔn basafa du; na ɔdze sika mapa duraa ho: na ɔdze nkyindur kataa afɔrpon no ho."

column2: "Nna Solomon dze sika mapa duraa ɔdan no mu: na ɔdze sika ntweaban dze twaa mpiakyir no enyim; na ɔdze sika duraa ho."
"Na ɔdan no nyina ɔdze sika duraa mu araa kodur dɛ wowiee ɔdan no nyinara: nkyii so ɔdze sika duraa afɔrpon a ɔwɔ mpiakyir no ho nyinara."
"Na ɔdze ngodua yɛɛ kerubim ebien wɔ mpiakyir no mu
column3: kor ne tsentsen yɛ basafa enum."

column2: "Na kerub no n’atsaban kor yɛ basafa ebien nye fa; na kerub no n’atsaban kor no so basafa ebien nye fa: ofi atsaban tsir kor ano dze kodu atsaban tsir kor so ano ɔyɛ basafa enum."
"Na kerub kor no so yɛ basafa enum: kerubim ebien nyina wɔ nsusui kor na su kor."
"Kerub baako no krɔn basafa enum
column3: na kerub baako no so tse dɛmara."

column2: "Na ɔdze kerubim no sisii ekyir dan no mu: na kerubim no tserɛtserɛɛw hɔn ntsaban mu
column3: ma ɔbaako n’atsaban ɔka fasu kor
column4: na kerub baako so n’atsaban ɔka fasu kor no so; na hɔn ntsaban no keka enyim wɔ ɔdan no ne finimfin."

column2: "Na ɔdze sika duraa kerubim no ho."
"Na odzii dan no n’afasu no nyinara ho edwin hyiae
column3: dɛ ɔdze kerubim
column5: na nhyiren a wɔahanhan no ehonyi yɛɛ ho

column2: "Na ɔdan no ne daadze so ɔdze sika durae
column3: no mu na n’ekyir."

column2: "Na ɔdze ngodua yɛɛ mpiakyir ahɛnee no no mbobow: mpondua no etsifi na ne nkyɛnmu ɔyɛ fasu no mu ebupɛn enum mu kor."
"Nna ɔdze ngodua yɛɛ mbobow ebien; na odzii do edwin a ɔyɛ kerubim na mbɛdua na nhyiren a wɔahanhan
column3: na ɔdze sika duraa ho; na ɔtserɛɛw sika no mu kataa kerubfo na mbɛdua no do."

column2: "Dɛmara so na ɔdze ngodua yɛɛ asɔrfi no n’ahɛnee no mpondua no
column3: wɔ fasu no mu ebupɛn anan mu kor;"

column2: "na kupresidua mbobow ebien; abow kor wɔ afa ebien a ɔbobɔw
column3: na abow kor no so wɔ afa ebien a ɔbobɔw."

column2: "Na odzii ho edwin
column3: kerubfo na mbɛdua na nhyiren a wɔahanhan: na ɔdze sika duraa ho dze kekae tsintsiim nkrukyei no mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze abo a wɔasen akyerɛpɛn ebiasa
column3: na nkyindur mpuna akyerɛpɛn kor yɛɛ no mu abangua no."

column2: "Afe a otsia anan no mu bosoom Ziv mu
column3: na wɔtoow EWURADZE ne dan no ne fapem."

column2: "Na afe a otsia dubiako no mu
column3: bosoom Bul a ɔyɛ bosoom a otsia awɔtwe no mu
column4: na wowiee ɔdan no no ho ndzɛmba nyinara
column5: na mbrɛ ne yɛbea no tse nyinara ho afamu. Mfe esuon nna ɔdze sii."
